name: SaGa 3: Jikuu no Hasha - Shadow or Light
summary: This remake is an RPG that makes use of the story and world view of the Game Boy version of "SaGa III" and renews all characters and battle systems. The latest in the "Saga" series, which has further advanced the evolution system "SSS (Scenario Sync System)" of the free scenario system, in which the six races can change freely and various growth factors are also powered up, and the battle and the scenario are closely intertwined.
